briefdescription.para: Gets or sets a boolean value indicating whether to allow embedding fonts with PostScript outlines when embedding TrueType fonts in a document upon it is saved. The default value is false.

detaileddescription.para: Note, Word does not embed PostScript fonts, but can open documents with embedded fonts of this type.
This option only works when EmbedTrueTypeFonts of the FontInfos property is set to true.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets path to default template (including filename). Default value for this property is empty string.
Gets a value determining how 3D effects are rendered.
Gets or sets a value determining how DrawingML effects are rendered.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is Simplified.
This property is used when the document is exported to fixed page formats.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets a value determining how DrawingML shapes are rendered.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is Fallback.
This property is used when the document is exported to fixed page formats.

briefdescription.para: When true, causes the name and version of Aspose.Words to be embedded into produced files. Default value is true.
Gets or sets value determining which document formats are allowed to be mapped by XmlMapping. By default only FlatOpc document format is allowed to be mapped.
Gets or sets a value determining how ink (InkML) objects are rendered.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is InkML.
This property is used when the document is exported to fixed page formats.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets value determining if memory optimization should be performed before saving the document. Default value for this property is false.
When true, pretty formats output where applicable. Default value is false.

detaileddescription.para: Set to true to make HTML, MHTML, EPUB, WordML, RTF, DOCX and ODT output human readable. Useful for testing or debugging.

briefdescription.para: Called during saving a document and accepts data about saving progress.

detaileddescription.para: Progress is reported when saving to Docx, FlatOpc, Docm, Dotm, Dotx, Html, Mhtml, Epub, XamlFlow, or XamlFlowPack.

briefdescription.para: Specifies the format in which the document will be saved if this save options object is used.
Specifies the folder for temporary files used when saving to a DOC or DOCX file. By default this property is null and no temporary files are used.

detaileddescription.para: When Aspose.Words saves a document, it needs to create temporary internal structures. By default, these internal structures are created in memory and the memory usage spikes for a short period while the document is being saved. When saving is complete, the memory is freed and reclaimed by the garbage collector.

If you are saving a very large document (thousands of pages) and/or processing many documents at the same time, then the memory spike during saving can be significant enough to cause the system to throw OutOfMemoryException. Specifying a temporary folder using TempFolder will cause Aspose.Words to keep the internal structures in temporary files instead of memory. It reduces the memory usage during saving, but will decrease the save performance.
The folder must exist and be writable, otherwise an exception will be thrown.
Aspose.Words automatically deletes all temporary files when saving is complete.

briefdescription.para: Gets a value determining whether the CreatedTime property is updated before saving. Default value is false;.
Gets or sets a value determining if fields of certain types should be updated before saving the document to a fixed page format. Default value for this property is true.
Gets or sets a value determining whether the LastPrinted property is updated before saving.
Gets or sets a value determining whether the LastSavedTime property is updated before saving.
Gets or sets value determining whether content of StructuredDocumentTag is updated before saving.
Gets or sets a value determining whether or not to use anti-aliasing for rendering.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is false. When this value is set to true anti-aliasing is used for rendering.

This property is used when the document is exported to the following formats: Tiff, Png, Bmp, Jpeg, Emf. When the document is exported to the Html, Mhtml, Epub and Azw3 formats this option is used for raster images.

briefdescription.para: Gets or sets a value determining whether or not to use high quality (i.e. slow) rendering algorithms.

detaileddescription.para: The default value is false.
This property is used when the document is exported to image formats: Tiff, Png, Bmp, Jpeg, Emf.

briefdescription.para: Setter for Aspose::Words::Saving::SaveOptions::get_AllowEmbeddingPostScriptFonts.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Saving::SaveOptions::get_DefaultTemplate.
Sets a value determining how 3D effects are rendered.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Saving::SaveOptions::get_DmlEffectsRenderingMode.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Saving::SaveOptions::get_DmlRenderingMode.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Saving::SaveOptions::get_ExportGeneratorName.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Saving::SaveOptions::get_FlatOpcXmlMappingOnly.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Saving::SaveOptions::get_ImlRenderingMode.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Saving::SaveOptions::get_MemoryOptimization.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Saving::SaveOptions::get_PrettyFormat.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Saving::SaveOptions::get_ProgressCallback.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Saving::SaveOptions::get_SaveFormat.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Saving::SaveOptions::get_TempFolder.
Sets a value determining whether the CreatedTime property is updated before saving. Default value is false;.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Saving::SaveOptions::get_UpdateFields.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Saving::SaveOptions::get_UpdateLastPrintedProperty.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Saving::SaveOptions::get_UpdateLastSavedTimeProperty.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Saving::SaveOptions::get_UpdateSdtContent.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Saving::SaveOptions::get_UseAntiAliasing.
Setter for Aspose::Words::Saving::SaveOptions::get_UseHighQualityRendering.
Creates a save options object of a class suitable for the specified save format.
Creates a save options object of a class suitable for the file extension specified in the given file name.
This is an abstract base class for classes that allow the user to specify additional options when saving a document into a particular format.
